title: Recogniz.ing Changelog
description: AI-powered voice typing with real-time transcription powered by Google's Gemini AI.

highlights: Consistent notification auto-dismiss behavior across all SnackBars
All notifications now dismiss after 4 seconds with Dismiss button

changes.title: SnackBar Duration and Action Consistency
changes.description: Standardized all SnackBar instances to use Duration(seconds: 4) with a Dismiss button for consistent auto-dismiss behavior. Notifications in transcriptions, dashboard, dictionaries, and prompts pages all follow the same pattern.

changes.title: Notification Appearance
changes.description: Ensured all SnackBars use behavior: SnackBarBehavior.floating with consistent Dismiss button styling (white text color) across all pages.

changes.title: Path Package Dependency
changes.description: Fixed path package indentation in pubspec.yaml dev_dependencies to resolve CI workflow failures.

highlights: ML-based Voice Activity Detection with Silero VAD (~95% accuracy)
50% reduction in API calls through optimized single-call transcription
Token-efficient prompts reducing overhead by ~67%
Support for up to 3.5 hours of audio per request (100MB inline limit)

changes.title: Silero VAD Integration
changes.description: Integrated Silero VAD (ML-based voice activity detection) with ~95% accuracy for speech detection. Uses ONNX Runtime for native performance with FFI bindings to vad package v0.0.7.

changes.title: Graceful VAD Fallback
changes.description: Implemented facade pattern with automatic fallback from Silero VAD to amplitude-based VAD (~75% accuracy) when ML model is unavailable. Ensures functionality across all platforms.

changes.title: VadServiceInterface
changes.description: Created abstraction layer for VAD implementations enabling runtime switching between Silero and amplitude-based detection methods.

changes.title: Single-Call Transcription
changes.description: Eliminated two-call transcription pattern. Now uses single optimized API call combining all transcription requirements, reducing API calls by 50% and latency by ~50%.

changes.title: Token-Efficient Prompts
changes.description: Condensed prompt templates from ~120 tokens to ~40 tokens, removing verbose instructions and redundant 'CLEAN VERSION:' markers across all 6 default prompts.

changes.title: Cache Key Optimization
changes.description: Optimized cache key generation from O(n) full audio iteration to O(1) sampling using first/last 100 bytes. Dramatically improves performance for cached requests.

changes.title: Audio Configuration
changes.description: Standardized audio encoding to 16kHz sample rate with AAC at 64kbps for optimal speech recognition quality and file size.

changes.title: Audio MIME Type
changes.description: Fixed audio MIME type from audio/mp4 to audio/aac for better API compatibility.

changes.title: Storage Pagination
changes.description: Optimized storage list operations using sublist instead of removeRange for O(1) pagination performance.

changes.title: Documentation
changes.description: Updated README.md with VAD features, performance optimizations, and accurate technical specifications.

highlights: Automated version bump and release workflow
Landing page version now syncs automatically with app version
GitHub release notes now use CHANGELOG.json data

changes.title: Automated Release Workflow
changes.description: The make release command now automatically commits changes, creates git tags, and pushes to trigger GitHub Actions builds. Run make release and the entire process is automated.

changes.title: Landing Version Sync
changes.description: landing/package.json version is now automatically synchronized with pubspec.yaml during version bumps.

changes.title: Release Notes from CHANGELOG.json
changes.description: GitHub Actions now generates release notes from CHANGELOG.json data, showing highlights and categorized changes instead of git log.

changes.title: Features Page
changes.description: Updated features page to highlight Multi-Language Transcription as a core feature with 20+ supported languages.

changes.title: Changelog Version Order
changes.description: Fixed bug where new versions were appended to the end of the versions array instead of being inserted at the beginning. The landing changelog now correctly shows the newest version first.

changes.title: Duplicate Version Script
changes.description: Removed scripts/version-bump.sh as it duplicated functionality from version_manager.dart.

highlights: Multi-language transcription support with automatic language detection
Language selector in Settings with 20+ supported languages
Detected language display on transcription cards

changes.title: Multi-Language Transcription
changes.description: Added automatic language detection for transcriptions. The app now detects the language spoken automatically and transcribes in the original language without translation. Supports code-switching (e.g., mixed Chinese-English speech).

changes.title: Language Selector
changes.description: Added transcription language selector in Settings with 20+ supported languages including English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Malay, Tagalog, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, and Ukrainian.

changes.title: Detected Language Display
changes.description: Added detected language badge on transcription cards showing the language of each transcription. Displays native language names for better user recognition.

changes.title: System Instructions
changes.description: Added system instruction support to GeminiService for consistent multi-language behavior across all API calls. Instructions now tell Gemini to NEVER translate and to preserve code-switching exactly as spoken.

changes.title: Language Constants
changes.description: Added TranscriptionLanguages helper class with language code normalization for handling various locale code formats (e.g., zh-CN, zh-TW, en-US, en-GB).

changes.title: Transcription Language Setting
changes.description: Added transcriptionLanguage field to AppSettings with auto-detect as default. Allows users to optionally specify a target output language.

changes.title: GeminiService Interface
changes.description: Updated TranscriptionServiceInterface to accept optional targetLanguage parameter for future translation capabilities.

changes.title: About Section from Settings
changes.description: Removed the About section from Settings page for a cleaner, more focused UI.

changes.title: Hive Backward Compatibility
changes.description: Added defaultValue to HiveField annotations for new fields to ensure backward compatibility with existing user data.

highlights: Complete app logo redesign with bold 'R' for Recogniz.ing
Red recording dot positioned at end of R's right leg
New blue-teal-emerald gradient conveying trust and reliability

changes.title: App Logo Redesign
changes.description: Complete logo redesign featuring a bold geometric 'R' letter in white on a blue-to-teal-to-emerald gradient background. The red recording dot is positioned at the end of the R's right leg, creating a clear visual metaphor for the app's voice recording functionality.

changes.title: Color Scheme Update
changes.description: Updated from cyan-indigo-emerald to a more professional deep blue (#1E40AF) → cyan/teal (#0891B2) → emerald (#10B981) gradient that conveys trust, reliability, and accuracy.

changes.title: Platform Icons
changes.description: Regenerated all platform icons (Android, iOS, macOS, Windows, Web) and landing page assets with the new modern design following 2025 minimalist trends.

changes.title: Unused Logo Files
changes.description: Removed redundant assets/logo/ folder. Consolidated all icon assets to assets/icons/ as single source of truth.

highlights: Transcription status tracking with pending, processing, completed, failed states
Audio backup functionality for retrying failed transcriptions
Enhanced error tracking with retry count and completion timestamps

changes.title: Transcription Status Tracking
changes.description: Added TranscriptionStatus enum with states: pending, processing, completed, failed. Each transcription now tracks its lifecycle from initial recording through API processing to final result.

changes.title: Audio Backup for Retry
changes.description: Original audio files are now backed up to local storage, enabling retry functionality for failed transcriptions without requiring users to re-record.

changes.title: Error Tracking
changes.description: Added errorMessage field and retryCount to track transcription failures and retry attempts.

changes.title: Completion Timestamp
changes.description: Added completedAt field to track when transcription processing finished, enabling better analytics and user insights.

highlights: Redesigned app logo with modern voice-to-text metaphor
New distinctive icon with sound-wave-to-text transformation

changes.title: App Logo Redesign
changes.description: Complete logo redesign featuring vertical sound-wave bars that transform into horizontal text lines. Uses brand color progression (cyan → indigo → emerald) to visually represent the transcription flow.

changes.title: Platform Icons
changes.description: Updated all platform icons (Android, iOS, macOS, Windows, Web) and landing page favicons with the new modern design.

highlights: Fixed detached HEAD error when pushing landing downloads
macOS and Windows downloads now available

changes.title: Platform Releases
changes.description: macOS and Windows installers now available for download.

Removed auto-stop after silence for simplified workflow
Zero static analysis warnings and errors

changes.title: VAD Overlay UI

changes.title: Auto-Stop After Silence
changes.description: Removed auto-stop after silence feature for simplified manual recording control. Users now have full control over when to stop recording.

changes.title: Code Quality

changes.title: Hive Schema
